actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to assure greater competition for construction contracts to be let by the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers.

summary.text: Expresses the policy of Congress to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to prepare proposals for the construction of civil works projects in a manner that assures that no potential bidder is excluded from bidding on the contract due to the size of the bidder.

titles.title: A bill to assure greater competition for construction contracts to be let by the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers.
